entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Richmond Hill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:55 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:13 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
